languages.text: "Тогда сейчас будут самые молниеносные прятки, какие были в истории Тассеры! Финал — немедленно, как вы и приказали!"
languages.translation_comment: FakeGovernor. Встает. Переход к кат-сцене завершения пряток.

traits.locale_text: "Я сей же час объявлю о завершении игрищ. И мы немедля приступим к обсуждению! Не-мед-ля, я сказал!" {n}Последнее он адресует уже своим нетвердо стоящим конечностям.{/n}

languages.translation_comment: FakeGovernor. Встает. Переход к кат-сцене завершения пряток.

languages.text: "Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"
languages.original_text: "Тогда сейчас будут самые молниеносные прятки, какие были в истории Тассеры! Финал — немедленно, как вы и приказали!"

traits.locale_text: "Then we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"
"I will announce the end of the hunt at once. And we will proceed with the discussion!"
"Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"
"Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"
"Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"
"Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"
"Then we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"

languages.text: “既然这样，我们马上结束塔瑟拉历史上最短的冒牌货狩猎活动！按照您的吩咐，直接进入正题吧！”
languages.original_text: "Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"

traits.locale_text: “既然这样，我们马上结束塔瑟拉历史上最短的冒牌货狩猎活动！按照您的吩咐，直接进入正题吧！”

languages.text: «¡En ese caso, vamos a tener la Caza del Impostor más breve de la historia de Thassera! ¡Directos a la gran final, como usted ordena!».
languages.original_text: "Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"

traits.locale_text: «¡En ese caso, vamos a tener la Caza del Impostor más breve de la historia de Thassera! ¡Directos a la gran final, como usted ordena!».

languages.text: "O hâlde Thassera tarihindeki en kısa Taklitçi Avı'nı gerçekleştirmek üzereyiz! Tam da emrettiğiniz üzere son bölüme geçiyoruz!"
languages.original_text: "Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde Thassera tarihindeki en kısa Taklitçi Avı'nı gerçekleştirmek üzereyiz! Tam da emrettiğiniz üzere son bölüme geçiyoruz!"

languages.text: 「ならば、私たちはタッセーラ史上最も短い『偽者探し』を行うことになるでしょう！あなたのご命令通り、一気に決着へと進みましょう！」
languages.original_text: "Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、私たちはタッセーラ史上最も短い『偽者探し』を行うことになるでしょう！あなたのご命令通り、一気に決着へと進みましょう！」

languages.text: « Eh bien, ce sera la Chasse aux imposteurs la plus courte de toute l'histoire de Thassera ! On passe directement à l'événement final, comme demandé ! »
languages.original_text: "Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, ce sera la Chasse aux imposteurs la plus courte de toute l'histoire de Thassera ! On passe directement à l'événement final, comme demandé ! »

languages.text: "Dann werden wir gleich die kürzeste Jagd auf den Hochstapler in der Geschichte von Thassera haben! Direkt zum Finale, genau wie Ihr befohlen habt!"
languages.original_text: "Then, we are about to have the shortest Impostor Hunt in Thassera's history! Straight to the finale, just as you ordered!"

traits.locale_text: "Dann werden wir gleich die kürzeste Jagd auf den Hochstapler in der Geschichte von Thassera haben! Direkt zum Finale, genau wie Ihr befohlen habt!"
